settings.Headline: Our Partners
settings.paragraph: At Ruth, we want to see sustainable menstrual products made accessible. That’s why we’re partnering with shelters and organizations across Canada to help reduce period poverty nationally. Pads from our crowdfunding campaign in 2021 were donated to our partner organizations below:

settings.headline: Moontime Sisters
settings.description:
North Vancouver, BC

We are excited to donate products to Moon Time Sisters because they are committed to providing Northern Canadian communities with menstrual products.

settings.headline: All Cycles YEG
settings.description:
Edmonton, AB

All Cycles YEG provides menstrual products to homeless and income insecure Canadians and emphasizes inclusive menstruation within the 2SLGBTQIA+ community.
